trans-unit.source: Represents the XSLT transform for a digital signature as defined by the W3C.
trans-unit.target: Representa a transformação XSLT para uma assinatura digital, conforme definido pelo W3C.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class allows you to address an XML document using an XSLT transformation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe permite que você resolver um documento XML usando uma transformação XSLT.

trans-unit.source: This class uses XSLT to transform XML nodes into other XML nodes that you want to sign or encrypt.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe usa XSLT para transformar nós XML em outros nós XML que você deseja assinar ou criptografar.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> class to sign or encrypt specific parts of an XML document using an XSLT transformation.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> classe para assinar ou criptografar partes específicas de um documento XML usando uma transformação XSLT.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXsltTransformUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: O URI Uniform Resource Identifier () que descreve o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> classe é definida pelo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXsltTransformUrl> campo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the XSLT transform, see Section 6.6.5 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a transformação XSLT, consulte a seção 6.6.5 da especificação XMLDSIG, que está disponível a partir do W3C em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: Esta seção contém dois exemplos de código.

trans-unit.source: The first code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> class with an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro exemplo de código mostra como assinar e verificar um documento XML usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> classe com uma assinatura de envelope.

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to use members of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: O segundo exemplo de código demonstra como usar membros de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: **Example #1**
trans-unit.target: **Exemplo 1 #**

trans-unit.source: **Example #2**
trans-unit.target: **Exemplo 2 #**

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> class with an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como assinar e verificar um documento XML usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> classe com uma assinatura de envelope.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include comments; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para incluir comentários; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> class with comments, if specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> com comentários, se especificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma representação XML dos parâmetros do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> adequados para serem incluídos como subelementos de um elemento <see langword="<Transform>" /> XMLDSIG.

trans-unit.source: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object in an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de nós XML que representa o conteúdo específico da transformação necessário para descrever o objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> atual em um elemento <see langword="<Transform>" /> XMLDSIG.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do objeto retornado deve ser <xref:System.IO.Stream>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve the output of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput%2A> método para recuperar a saída do atual <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> objeto.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: The type of the output to return.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de saída a ser retornada.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> is the only valid type for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> é o único tipo válido para esse parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object of type <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> atual do tipo <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object of type <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: A saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> atual do tipo <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do objeto retornado deve ser <xref:System.IO.Stream>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve the output of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput%2A> método para recuperar a saída do atual <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter is not a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="type" /> não é um objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma matriz de tipos que são entradas válidas para o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: An array of valid input types for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de tipos de entrada válidas para o atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> objeto; você pode passar apenas os objetos de um desses tipos para o <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> método atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: Tipos de entrada válida para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> são <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, e <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.InputTypes%2A> property to retrieve the valid input types for the current transform.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como chamar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.InputTypes%2A> propriedade para recuperar os tipos de entrada válidos para a transformação atual.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object that encapsulates an XSLT style sheet to load into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> que encapsula uma folha de estilos XSLT a ser carregada no objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: This style sheet is applied to the document loaded by the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Esta folha de estilos é aplicada ao documento carregado pelo método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object as transform-specific content of a <see langword="<Transform>" /> element and configures the internal state of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object to match the <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Analisa o objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> especificado como conteúdo específico da transformação de um elemento <see langword="<Transform>" /> e configura o estado interno do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> atual para corresponder ao elemento <see langword="<Transform>" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to process subelements of a `<Transform>` element.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para processar os subelementos de um `<Transform>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> class with an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como assinar e verificar um documento XML usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> classe com uma assinatura de envelope.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="nodeList" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="nodeList" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="nodeList" /> parameter does not contain an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="nodeList" /> não contém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" />.

trans-unit.source: The input to load into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A entrada a ser carregada no objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified input into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Carrega a entrada especificada no objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de objeto de entrada deve ser um dos tipos de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.InputTypes%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: Tipos de entrada válida para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> são <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, e <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput%2A> method using the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object as the input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como chamar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput%2A> método usando especificado <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> objeto como entrada.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput" /> methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma matriz de tipos que são possíveis saídas provenientes de métodos <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: An array of valid output types for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput" /> methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de tipos de saída válido para o atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> objeto; somente os objetos de um desses tipos são retornados do <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput" /> métodos do atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream> is the only valid output type for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream> é o tipo de saída só é válida para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.OutputTypes%2A> property to retrieve the valid output types for the current transform.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como chamar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.OutputTypes%2A> propriedade para recuperar os tipos de saída válido para a transformação atual.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> classe.
